The general consensus is that when you start attempting to speak a complex
vocabulary, you are trying to imply that you have a superior level of
intelligence, however, people who do this are in fact dumb.  Basically, I'm
trying to say that you don't sound smart, asshole.
----- Original Message -----
From: "Kyle Stewart" <dewboy30816@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, October 29, 2001 11:30 AM
Subject: Re: Cutie


> Is it my fault my superior intellect (this is the way
> I talk when I don't have time to think out what I say
> which is pretty much whenever I'm not typing) I have
> gained extreme amounts of imagination, and hense
> impationse with such things as rpgs. Also my concept
> of our galaxy being a generator made scientific since.
> The planets orbit like turbines for billions of years
> before falling away.
>
